sentences: Mike Wofford (born in San Antonio, Texas) is a jazz pianist who was raised in San Diego, California.
He was an accompanist to singers Sarah Vaughan (in 1979) and Ella Fitzgerald (1989â€“1994).
He was known in the jazz community going back to the 1960s for the albums Strawberry Wine and Summer Night.
